item.description: I am happy to announce that Derek Ebrecht,a successful local investor and Real Estate Educator,has agreed to give his presentation on his methods.Derek runs the Easton meeting for the AREI-WIN organization and supports himself with his Real Estate endeavors.Therefore he has better info than many of the supposed "Guru's",who tend to depend on their "Teaching"to make a living.His focus will be on finding deals and getting off your duff.These meetings are becoming more and more popular,so I would RSVP early,especially if you are bringing guests.
item.name: Finding The Deal + Going Forward,Derek Ebrecht
